Class DashboardView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.littemplate.LitTemplate
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.views.dashboard.DashboardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.internal.Template, Serializable
@Tag("dashboard-view") @JsModule("./src/views/dashboard/dashboard-view.js") @Route(value="dashboard", layout=MainView.class) @PermitAll public class DashboardView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.littemplate.LitTemplate
Dashboard view component that displays analytics and business metrics for the bakery application.

This view provides a comprehensive overview of the bakery's business performance using various charts and data visualizations. It includes delivery statistics, order analytics, monthly performance indicators, and recent order tracking.

Key features:

  • Interactive charts for order trends and delivery statistics
  • Real-time performance metrics and KPI indicators
  • Monthly and yearly analytics with visual representations
  • Recent orders grid with detailed order information
  • Responsive layout that adapts to different screen sizes
  • Integration with Vaadin Charts for rich data visualization

Chart types included:

  • Solid gauge charts for delivery performance metrics
  • Pie charts for order distribution analysis
  • Line charts for monthly trend analysis
  • Data grids for detailed order listings

Security: This view is accessible to all authenticated users (@PermitAll). The dashboard provides read-only analytics data without sensitive information exposure.

Implementation: Uses LitTemplate for client-side rendering performance and integrates with the OrderService for real-time business data retrieval.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bakery Application

  • Constructor Details

    • DashboardView

      @Autowired public DashboardView(OrderService orderService, OrdersGridDataProvider orderDataProvider)
      Constructs the dashboard view with analytics data and chart configurations.

      Initializes all dashboard components, configures the orders grid with interactive order cards, and populates charts with current business data.

      Parameters:
      orderService - the service for retrieving order and analytics data
      orderDataProvider - the data provider for the orders grid
